mapper.sql: CN_OID, LINE_SEQ_NO, FIELD_NAME, FIELD_TYPE, INT_VALUE, FLOAT_VALUE, STRING_VALUE, BOOL_VALUE,DATE_VALUE
mapper.insert: insert into CN_DETAIL_EXTENDED (CN_OID, LINE_SEQ_NO, FIELD_NAME, FIELD_TYPE, INT_VALUE, FLOAT_VALUE, STRING_VALUE, BOOL_VALUE, DATE_VALUE) values (#{cnOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lineSeqNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fieldType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{intValue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{floatValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stringValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{boolValue,jdbcType=BIT},#{dateValue,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
